vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἔσωθεν
(εἴσωθεν only in [Refs 5th c.BC+], rarely ἔσωθε [Refs 5th c.BC+]: adverb: from within, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__2 within, inside, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἔσωθε ναοῦ [Refs]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
from within, from inside, inwardly
from within, from the interior, Mk. 7:21, 23; within, in the internal parts, Mt. 7:15; ὁ, ἡ, τὸ ἔσωθεν, interior, internal, Lk. 11:39, 40; ὁ ἔσωθεν ἄνθρωπος, the mind, soul, 2Cor. 4:16
vocabInfos._es_Definition: interno, dentro ; por dentro ; el interior, de dentro (LUC.11:39,40)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 從裡面
2) 裡面, 內部
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 从里面
2) 里面, 内部
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: bên trong; nơi bên trong. // ἔσω (G2080)
